author: tveronezi
msg: Fixing “Problem using Hibernate as my persistence” - http://openejb.979440.n4.nabble.com/Problem-using-Hibernate-as-my-persistence-provider-td982358.html. Behind the scenes, hibernate uses the “org.hibernate.ejb.Ejb3Configuration” class to create the EntityManagerFactory instance. This Ejb3Configuration class uses the ClassLoader of the current thread (in our case, the openejb main thread) instead of the ClassLoader which loaded the class itself.
